mapper.sql: a.t_personal_main_id, a.t_personal_main_name, a.t_personal_main_pid, a.t_personal_main_mobile, a.t_personal_main_mobile1, a.t_personal_main_contacts, a.t_personal_main_realname, a.t_personal_main_fingerprint, a.t_personal_main_facialret, a.t_personal_main_securityret, a.t_personal_main_passport, a.t_personal_main_passport1, a.t_personal_main_visa, a.t_personal_main_visa1, a.t_personal_main_onlinepaymentcat, a.t_personal_main_onlinepayment, a.t_personal_main_paymentmethod, a.t_personal_main_paymentmethod1, a.t_personal_main_CNbankcard, a.t_personal_main_GLbankcard, a.t_personal_main_bankacc, a.t_personal_main_crypto, a.t_personal_main_assetcat, a.t_personal_main_voucher, a.t_personal_main_creditscore, a.t_personal_main_ewalletcat, a.t_personal_main_digiasset, a.t_personal_main_companylist, a.t_personal_main_productCat, a.t_personal_main_prodlist, a.platform, a.status, a.email, a.remark, a.creator, a.create_time, a.modifier, a.modify_time
mapper.select:
select
from t_personal_main a where a.t_personal_main_id = #{t_personal_main_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.create_time

select
from t_personal_main a where
a.t_personal_main_name like CONCAT('%',#{t_personal_main_name},'%')
and a.t_personal_main_pid like CONCAT('%',#{t_personal_main_pid},'%')
and a.t_personal_main_mobile like CONCAT('%',#{t_personal_main_mobile},'%')
and a.t_personal_main_passport like CONCAT('%',#{t_personal_main_passport},'%')
and a.t_personal_main_securityret like CONCAT('%',#{t_personal_main_securityret},'%')
and a.t_personal_main_creditscore between #{creditscore_begin,jdbcType=INTEGER} and #{creditscore_end,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and a.remark like CONCAT('%',#{remark},'%')
order by a.create_time
